backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining user profiles, access control, story and verse data structures, and initial story seed data.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report containing a features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining prerequisites and steps for publishing the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining light and dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root mount point and favicon links referencing generated icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in the SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button using Internet Identity with login/logout and loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter a display name and saving it via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top‑level layout with header navigation, footer, login button, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/story/ImageUploa: Admin-only image upload component that validates selected files, tracks upload progress, and replaces story or verse images via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/story/PublicImag: Displays an image from an ExternalBlob and shows a fallback error state if loading fails.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management for authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, admin checks, stories, verses, daily verse, and image uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and utility classes for typography and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that initializes React, react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DailyVersePage.tsx: Page showing the daily verse with loading, error handling, and the ability to refresh the verse.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page displaying navigation cards linking to daily verses, stories, and testament pages.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Displays a list of stories with loading and error states, allowing navigation to individual story detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/StoryDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single story, including summary, verses, and image upload, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TestamentPage.tsx: Fetches and displays verses from either the Old or New Testament with navigation to verse detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/VerseDetailPage.tsx: Renders detailed information for a specific verse, including text and optional image, with navigation back to its testament page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current version, feature set, architectural notes, and admin-only image upload rules for a Bible verse website. Includes existing features, known issues, and indicates this is a fix request.
